name: The Five Steps To Ensuring Momo Graduates Successfully!!!
name_original: The Five Steps To Ensuring Momo Graduates Successfully!!!
description:
Created for NaNoReNo 2022

Story

As a magical girl, it is your duty to fight against the forces of evil and save the planet!!! 

Now, you're being faced by your most daunting task yet...

Ensuring a high schooler graduates.

Features
  • 2 whole endings :O
  • A lot of karaoke... maybe too much karaoke?
  • A Magical Girl :D
  • An original soundtrack!
Characters

Bubble. She's a magical girl.

Momo. She kinda just wants to sleep.

Rin. She knows what a Born-Haber cycle is.

Content Warnings (Spoilers Ahead!)

Highlight to read

  • Homophobic slurs

  • Verbal and physical abuse

  • Mild blood

  • Panic Attack

  • Implied suicide in "Give up" ending

Credits

🍓 Story + Art + Programming 🍓: 

milkkylemon

🍓 Music 🍓:

Harriet Ford
